alert.note: Alert for Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:53PM EDT until March 26 at 9:13AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jacksonville FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... North Fork Black Creek At Middleburg affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Black Creek At Middleburg. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Lazy Acre Road begins to flood. Lowlands flood and boat docks are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 16.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
